0fc925e2-af32-4b92-a270-49e47a1e61fc.description: The Smart Cities Practitioner Certificate recognizes individuals for their knowledge and contribution to the livability, workability and sustainable of communities. Those seeking the certification first complete a course of instruction followed by an assessment. Once the certification is received, practitioners are expected to continue contributing to their communities through education and active participation.
0fc925e2-af32-4b92-a270-49e47a1e61fc.name: Smart Cities Academy Practitioner Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: The credential allows individuals to be recognised for their knowledge and contribution to the industry. Participants may complete modules without having to complete assessment items. Successful completion of Foundation and Catalyst modules is required: Foundation modules - 'Smart Cities Fundamentals' and 'Essentials for Smart Cities Action' Catalyst modules - either 'Data Leadership', 'Sustainable Development Goals' or 'Data Activation'.

Gaining the Practitioner Certificate credential is optional for participants in the Academy - you may complete modules without having to complete assessment items. For those seeking the credential, successful completion of assessment items in the Foundation and Catalyst modules is required, specifically: Foundation modules - 'Smart Cities Fundamentals' and 'Essentials for Smart Cities Action' Catalyst modules - either 'Data Leadership', 'Sustainable Development Goals' or 'Data Activation'.
